item.title: Getting started with Arch Linux
item.description: Warranty Disclaimer I am not responsible for data loss, possible hardware failures, thermonuclear war, or you getting fired because your arch driven atomic plant failed. If you have any concerns regarding the installation don’t hesitate to do some research on your own to prevent possible failures or bugs. After booting the arch iso you’ll will have to proceed with the following steps:
